title: Not launching on my mac, after re-installing
body: I wanted to play some LoL but when i opened the app nothing appeared, i waited about 5 minutes and not a window appeared so i tried opening again and same result, then i uninstalled it cause it wasnt working. i deleted it completely, then went to the website to re install it. after i did it opened the window and downloaded the patch and all that but when i clicked the launch button it did the same thing, no window appeared or anything, i opened the app again and pressed launch again and the same result, how do i fix this?

replies.body:
It almost sounds like your Mac might be stopping League from launching correctly. We've been noticing that some of our Mac player base has been able to get around this by making sure that their OS is completely updated. 

On that note, some of our players can see that they are up to date, but looking through their logs shows that their system is actually behind a version. Let's try something really quick and try and grabbing the update from [**this link**](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/macos-sierra/id1127487414?mt=12&ls=1) and forcing it to manually update. Hit me back up and let me know how this works!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0dgKrwuy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-20T04:36:47.243+0000)
>
> It almost sounds like your Mac might be stopping League from launching correctly. We've been noticing that some of our Mac player base has been able to get around this by making sure that their OS is completely updated. 
> 
> On that note, some of our players can see that they are up to date, but looking through their logs shows that their system is actually behind a version. Let's try something really quick and try and grabbing the update from [**this link**](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/macos-sierra/id1127487414?mt=12&ls=1) and forcing it to manually update. Hit me back up and let me know how this works!

And what about those who unfortunately have IMAC 2007's which are not able to upgrade to Sierra :(?

Hmmmmmm let's try seeing if we can at least get you updated to El Capitan! Check out this [**download link**](https://support.apple.com/kb/dl1884?locale=en_US) and let me know if you're able to get that upgrade instead.
